name: Simple Text Embedding with VectorizeJS
description: A beginner-level application demonstrating how to use VectorizeJS with Ollama/LLaMA 3.2 to generate embeddings for text documents and store them in PostgreSQL.

name: Retrieval Augmented Generation with VectorizeJS
description: An intermediate-level application showcasing how to build a RAG system using VectorizeJS, Ollama/LLaMA 3.2, and PostgreSQL.

name: Agentic RAG with VectorizeJS and langgraph
description: An advanced-level application demonstrating how to build an agent-based RAG system using VectorizeJS, langgraph, Ollama/LLaMA 3.2, and PostgreSQL.
